reviewtext: I have owned these for over two years and wore them about 30 times, mostly on plane rides.I have a relatively small head, so I keep them at the first expansion level.  Even so, there is a lot of pressure.  After about an hour they start to hurt my ears.  I have tried to "stretch" them, but they always return to the same size.  I also put extra foam padding in the ear cups, which helped a little.They still have good sound quality, and cut noise- although they are not as effective as when I first bought them.I tried the new Bose.  They fit better and they do a much better job of eliminating noise, but of course they are much more expensive.
